Watch live: @POTUS speaks at the 95th National Convention of Disabled American Veterans: https://t.co/Dn6oT6hEpW #HonoringVets
"It's good to be back with the Disabled American Veterans. What a journey we've had together" —@POTUS. Watch live: https://t.co/Dn6oT6hEpW
“Some of the most unforgettable experiences I’d had have been the moments I’ve spent with you—America’s veterans and your families.” —@POTUS
"We’ve stood together at Normandy to thank a generation—among them, my grandfather...that literally saved the world" https://t.co/pEd4qLQLaF
RT @WHLive: “No war should ever be forgotten and no veteran should ever be overlooked.” —@POTUS at @DAVHQ. Watch live: https://t.co/WkFIANG…
"When I came into office, we had nearly 180,000 American troops in Afghanistan and Iraq. Today, that number is less than 15,000.” —@POTUS
"As Commander-in-Chief, I’m pretty tired of some folks trash talking America’s military and troops."  —@POTUS at @DAVHQ
“Let’s get some facts straight. America’s Army is the best-trained, best-equipped land force on the planet.” —@POTUS
“Our Navy is the largest and most lethal in the world. The precision and reach of our Air Force is unmatched.” —@POTUS
“Our Marines are the world’s only truly expeditionary force. We have the finest Coast Guard.”
"America’s military is the most capable fighting force in history—and we’re going to keep it that way.” —@POTUS at @DAVHQ
"No one—no one—has given more for our freedom and security than our Gold Star families." —@POTUS at @DAVHQ https://t.co/4xONzNk04z
"This country that we love hasn’t just endured. We’ve thrived and overcome challenges that would have broken a lesser nation" —@POTUS
RT @WHLive: "We believe in taking care of each other, lifting each other up, leaving no one behind" —@POTUS at @DAVHQ
“America’s commitment to our veterans is not just lines in a budget…Our commitment to our veterans is a sacred covenant.” —@POTUS
"The citizens you kept safe—we pledge to take care of you and your families when you come home. That's a sacred covenant" —@POTUS at @DAVHQ
“Working together over these past eight years, we’ve delivered real progress for our veterans.  And we can’t let up." —@POTUS at @DAVHQ
RT @WHLive: “About 200,000 service members are becoming veterans every year. And America’s got to be there for you for a lifetime.” —@POTUS…
RT @WHLive: “Altogether, we will have increased funding for veterans by more than 85 percent.” —@POTUS at @DAVHQ
“I do have to point out—Republicans in Congress have proposed cutting my VA budget.” —@POTUS at @DAVHQ. Watch live: https://t.co/Dn6oT6hEpW
RT @WHLive: “Thanks to the Affordable Care Act—Obamacare—veterans not covered by the VA now have access to quality, affordable health care”…
RT @WHLive: Veterans can now finally apply for VA health care anytime...in as little as 20 minutes. Just go to https://t.co/P4kfdfv6ud.” —@…
“We now have a designated women’s health provider at all VA clinics to make sure our women veterans get the tailored care” —@POTUS
RT @WHLive: “We’re reaching more veterans...with telemedicine—so you can see someone at the VA without ever leaving home.” —@POTUS
“500,000 veterans...have stepped forward & donated your health & genetic data for research, which brings us halfway to our goal” —@POTUS
“We’ve increased funding for veterans mental health care by more than 75%—billions more dollars" —@POTUS at @DAVHQ https://t.co/Mf5rmA4c4m
RT @WHLive: "When too many veterans still aren’t getting the care they need—we all have to be outraged. We all have to do better."  —@POTUS
“We’ve hired thousands more doctors, nurses and staff; opened more clinical space” —@POTUS. Watch live: https://t.co/Dn6oT6hEpW
“Here’s one thing we will not do—we cannot outsource and privatize health care for America’s veterans.” —@POTUS at @DAVHQ
“From it's peak, we’ve now slashed that backlog by nearly 90 percent.” —@POTUS on the disability claims backlog https://t.co/N0lKrnnvOG
“We’ve got to keep fighting for the dignity of every veteran—and that includes ending the tragedy...of veteran homelessness" —@POTUS
"I can announce that, nationally, we have now reduced the number of homeless veterans by 47%—nearly half." —@POTUS https://t.co/pwh6Q2uE2s
“We will not stop until every veteran who fought for America has a home in America. This is something we've got to get done.” —@POTUS
“We’ve helped more than 1.6 million veterans and their families realize their dream of an education." —@POTUS https://t.co/RnznDWwkDy
“Starting this fall, we’ll close loopholes to protect our troops and military families from predatory pay-day lenders. ” —@POTUS at @DAVHQ
“We’ve cut veterans unemployment by more than half—down to 4.2 percent...lower than the national average." —@POTUS https://t.co/LKFyeuIIyc
“To every company in America—if you want talent, if you want dedication...hire a vet! Hire a military spouse!” —@POTUS at @DAVHQ
"When we take care of each other, when we uphold that sacred covenant, then there is nothing we can’t do." —@POTUS at @DAVHQ.
